description_for_human: useful when you want to generate a new real image from both the user description and segmentations.
description_for_model: useful when you want to generate a new real image from both the user description and segmentations. like: generate a real image of a object or something from this segmentation image, or generate a new real image of a object or something from these segmentations. The input to this tool should be image path and the user description
